Woman accused of killing her father in a house fire tells undercover cop: ‘Arson is the easiest thing in the world’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-accused-of-killing-her-father-in-a-house-fire-tells-undercover-cop-arson-is-the-easiest-thing-世界中/BWZTXE2UEBBJXGL6ERLAPHQ3EI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-accused-of-killing-her-father-in-a-house-fire-tells-undercover-cop-arson-is-the-easiest-thing-世界中/BWZTXE2UEBBJXGL6ERLAPHQ3EI/ Evidence shows the fire started from a pot of hot oil left on an element.
